name: Fungal Infection

symptoms.itching: Persistent irritation and discomfort on the skin.
symptoms.redness: Inflammation and discoloration in affected areas.
symptoms.peeling_skin: Flaky and scaly skin, often accompanied by cracks.

possible_causes: Direct contact with infected individuals or surfaces
medical_relief: Oral antifungal medications for severe infections
Keeping the skin dry and clean

symptoms.sneezing: Frequent nasal irritation leading to sneezing.
symptoms.skin_rashes: Raised, itchy bumps or patches on the skin.

name: GERD (Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease)

symptoms.heartburn: Burning sensation in the chest, often after eating.
symptoms.regurgitation: Sour or bitter-tasting acid backing up into the throat.
symptoms.difficulty_swallowing: Feeling of food being stuck in the throat.

medical_relief: Lifestyle modifications (avoiding late-night meals, weight loss)

name: Chronic Cholestasis

symptoms.yellow_skin: Jaundice-like discoloration due to bile flow obstruction.
symptoms.itching: Severe irritation due to bile accumulation in the blood.
symptoms.dark_urine: Urine appearing darker due to excess bilirubin.

medical_relief: Ursodeoxycholic acid to improve bile flow
Liver-supporting diet rich in fiber and antioxidants

symptoms.skin_rash: Red, irritated skin due to allergic reaction.
symptoms.swelling: Localized swelling, particularly in the face or throat.
symptoms.difficulty_breathing: Severe allergic reaction (anaphylaxis) requiring immediate attention.

symptoms.stomach_pain: Burning pain in the stomach, usually between meals.
symptoms.bloating: Feeling full even with small meals.
symptoms.vomiting_blood: In severe cases, ulcers may bleed internally.

name: AIDS

symptoms.persistent_infections: Frequent bacterial, viral, or fungal infections.

medical_relief: Antiretroviral therapy (ART) to control HIV progression
Avoiding infections and maintaining a healthy lifestyle

symptoms.frequent_urination: Increased need to urinate, especially at night.
symptoms.excessive_thirst: Constant feeling of thirst despite drinking water.
symptoms.unexplained_weight_loss: Loss of weight despite normal or increased food intake.

name: Gastroenteritis

symptoms.vomiting: Persistent nausea and expelling food from the stomach.
symptoms.dehydration: Loss of body fluids leading to dry mouth and dizziness.

medical_relief: Avoiding dairy and fatty foods during recovery

symptoms.breathlessness: Shortness of breath, especially at night or early morning.
symptoms.coughing: Persistent cough, often worsening with exercise or cold air.

symptoms.headache: Frequent or severe headaches, especially in the morning.
symptoms.chest_pain: Pain or pressure in the chest, indicating potential complications.

name: Migraine

symptoms.intense_headache: Severe throbbing pain, usually on one side of the head.
symptoms.light_sensitivity: Discomfort or pain in bright light.

medical_relief: Avoiding triggers and maintaining a consistent sleep schedule

name: Cervical Spondylosis

symptoms.neck_pain: Persistent pain in the neck, often spreading to shoulders.
symptoms.stiffness: Difficulty moving the neck, especially in the morning.
symptoms.tingling_sensation: Numbness or weakness in arms and hands.

possible_causes: Aging and wear-and-tear of spinal discs

name: Paralysis (Brain Hemorrhage)

symptoms.sudden_weakness: Loss of strength, often on one side of the body.

medical_relief: Emergency medical care (clot-busting drugs for stroke)

symptoms.dark_urine: Urine appears much darker than usual.

name: Malaria
possible_causes: Bite from an infected mosquito (Plasmodium parasite)

name: Chickenpox

symptoms.skin_rash: Red, itchy blisters all over the body.
symptoms.fever: Mild to high fever accompanying the rash.

possible_causes: Close contact with an infected person

name: Dengue

symptoms.high_fever: Sudden high temperature, often with chills.
symptoms.severe_joint_pain: Pain in muscles and joints, sometimes called 'breakbone fever'.
symptoms.skin_rash: Red rash that may appear after fever subsides.

possible_causes: Bite from Aedes mosquito carrying dengue virus
Lack of immunity in affected individuals
medical_relief: Avoid NSAIDs like aspirin (risk of bleeding)

symptoms.high_fever: Prolonged fever lasting more than a week.
symptoms.abdominal_pain: Pain and discomfort in the stomach.

name: Hepatitis A

symptoms.nausea: Feeling of vomiting and loss of appetite.

possible_causes: Consumption of contaminated food or water
Close contact with an infected person

name: Urinary Tract Infection (UTI)

symptoms.burning_sensation: Painful urination with a burning feeling.
symptoms.frequent_urination: Needing to urinate often, even with small amounts.
symptoms.cloudy_urine: Urine may appear cloudy or have a strong odor.

possible_causes: Bacterial infection (E. coli is the most common)
medical_relief: Cranberry juice (may help in some cases)

name: Hepatitis B

symptoms.joint_pain: Swelling and discomfort in the joints.

possible_causes: Exposure to infected blood or bodily fluids
medical_relief: Lifestyle changes to protect liver health

symptoms.jaundice: Yellowing of the skin and eyes.

name: Hepatitis D

symptoms.jaundice: Yellowing of the skin and eyes.
symptoms.fluid_retention: Swelling in the abdomen or legs.

medical_relief: Interferon therapy to control the virus

name: Hepatitis E
possible_causes: Consumption of contaminated food or water

symptoms.fluid_buildup: Swelling in the abdomen due to fluid retention.

name: Dimorphic Hemorrhoids (Piles)

symptoms.pain: Discomfort and swelling in the anal area.

medical_relief: High-fiber diet and increased water intake
Minimally invasive procedures (laser treatment, rubber band ligation)

name: Varicose Veins

symptoms.swollen_veins: Bulging, twisted veins, usually in the legs.
symptoms.leg_pain: Aching or discomfort after standing long hours.
symptoms.itching: Irritation and discomfort around the veins.

medical_relief: Compression stockings for improved blood flow
Surgical removal of affected veins in severe cases

name: Hypoglycemia

symptoms.shakiness: Tremors and weakness due to low blood sugar.
symptoms.sweating: Excessive perspiration, even in cool conditions.

medical_relief: Immediate consumption of fast-acting sugar (glucose tablets, juice)

name: Osteoarthritis

symptoms.joint_pain: Pain in the knees, hips, hands, or spine.
symptoms.stiffness: Limited range of motion in affected joints.

possible_causes: Wear and tear of joint cartilage
Obesity and excessive strain on joints
medical_relief: Joint replacement surgery in severe cases

name: Psoriasis

symptoms.red_patches: Inflamed, scaly skin that may crack or bleed.

possible_causes: Triggers like stress, infections, or certain medications

name: Impetigo

symptoms.blisters: Fluid-filled sores that burst and form crusts.

possible_causes: Cuts or insect bites allowing bacteria entry
medical_relief: Keeping affected areas clean and dry
Using separate towels and personal hygiene items

name: Hypothyroidism

symptoms.fatigue: Extreme tiredness and lack of energy.

medical_relief: Managing stress and maintaining a healthy lifestyle

name: Acne

symptoms.pimples: Red, inflamed bumps on the skin filled with pus.
symptoms.blackheads: Small, dark spots on the skin caused by clogged pores.
symptoms.whiteheads: Small, white bumps on the skin due to trapped oil and bacteria.
symptoms.oily_skin: Excessive production of sebum leading to greasy skin.
symptoms.redness: Inflamed and irritated skin, especially around breakouts.
symptoms.scarring: Dark spots or deep marks left behind after acne heals.

possible_causes: Excessive oil production by sebaceous glands
Clogged hair follicles due to dead skin cells
Dietary factors (high sugar and dairy consumption)
medical_relief: Topical treatments (Benzoyl Peroxide, Salicylic Acid, Retinoids)
Oral medications (Antibiotics, Hormonal therapy, Isotretinoin for severe cases)
Maintaining a proper skincare routine with gentle cleansing
Avoiding excessive touching or picking at acne-prone areas

symptoms.chronic_cough: Persistent cough lasting more than three weeks.
symptoms.fatigue: Extreme tiredness and lack of energy.

symptoms.runny_nose: Excessive mucus production in the nasal passages.
symptoms.sneezing: Frequent sneezing due to irritation in the nasal cavity.
symptoms.sore_throat: Pain and irritation in the throat.

symptoms.chest_pain: Sharp or stabbing pain when breathing or coughing.
symptoms.difficulty_breathing: Shortness of breath and rapid breathing.

name: Heart Attack

symptoms.chest_pain: Severe pain or pressure in the chest.
symptoms.nausea: Feeling sick to the stomach or vomiting.
symptoms.cold_sweats: Excessive sweating with a cold, clammy feeling.

medical_relief: Immediate aspirin intake to prevent clotting

name: Hyperthyroidism

symptoms.weight_loss: Unintentional weight loss despite normal eating habits.
symptoms.heat_intolerance: Increased sensitivity to heat and excessive sweating.

medical_relief: Surgical removal of the thyroid in severe cases

name: Arthritis

symptoms.joint_pain: Persistent pain and stiffness in the joints.
symptoms.swelling: Inflammation and redness in affected joints.
symptoms.morning_stiffness: Stiffness in joints, especially after waking up.

medical_relief: Joint replacement surgery in severe cases

name: (Vertigo) Paroxysmal Positional Vertigo

symptoms.dizziness: Sudden spinning sensation or loss of balance.

possible_causes: Calcium deposits in the ear canal
medical_relief: Epley maneuver (specific head movements to reposition ear crystals)
